name: CHAINBREAK
description:
WARNING: this game features flashing lights, heavy screenshake and vivid colours.


Ascend to the top-floor and break the chain!

CHAINBREAK is a colourful hyperkinetic shooter with roguelite elements. 

After being imprisoned for an unknown amount of time, now is your chance to escape! Fight your way through waves of dangerous enemies and aggressive bosses. Gain powerful abilities and buy helpful upgrades to reach the top of the tower.


Features:

  • Fast-paced and high-octane action!
  • 3 increasingly intense levels!
  • 3(?) dangerous boss fights that will put your skills to the test!
  • Multiple unique abilities and upgrades to aid you in your fight!
  • Aggressive soundtrack by White Bat Audio!
  • A sealed entrance for those who wish to truly break their chains...


Extra:

  • Options to reduce screenshake and background motion.
  • Full controls customization.

CHAINBREAK is completely free. If you wish to support me, an optional payment would be very helpful.
